thread.title: CNN's Jim Sciutto: Trump's Putin Comments Put America on Same...
thread.title_full: CNN's Jim Sciutto: Trump's Putin Comments Put America on Same...

title: CNN's Jim Sciutto: Trump's Putin Comments Put America on Same...
text:
CNN’s Jim Sciutto: Trump’s Putin Comments Put America on Same ‘Moral Relativism’ as Authoritarian States by Ken Meyer | 9:21 pm, February 4th, 2017 video 
CNN National Security correspondent Jim Sciutto reacted to President Trump ‘s latest interview tonight by saying that the remarks lowered America to the sociopolitical standard of authoritarian countries. 
In a previewed clip from Trump’s pre-Super Bowl interview, the president shrugged off Bill O’Reilly when the Fox host said that Russian President Vladimir Putin is a “killer.” Trump responded with “We’ve got a lot of killers. What, do you think our country’s so innocent?” 
Poppy Harlow asked Sciutto for his reaction, and he said that Trump essentially talked down America by saying its actions are comparable to practices in Russia and China. Sciutto was also concerned that authoritarian nations might take Trump’s “moral relativism” and use it as a propaganda tool to justify their own behaviors. 
“The U.S. has made many mistakes, but the question is, putting it on a par with a historic authoritarian state such as Russia is, one, just not factually true, and two, just a remarkable thing for American president to say,” Sciutto said. Sciutto went on to contrast America and Russia’s historical actions, and he reiterated that it was “just remarkable” to hear Trump comparing the two. 
Watch above, via CNN.
